headline: Is CVS Health’s (CVS) Leadership Consolidation Signaling a Shift in Long-Term Strategy?
summary: CVS Health announced that its Board of Directors has elected President and CEO David Joyner as Chair of the Board, effective January 1, 2026, with current Executive Chair Roger Farah remaining on the Board and Michael Mahoney continuing as Lead Independent Director. This move consolidates board and executive leadership under Joyner, reflecting board confidence in his healthcare expertise and recent operational improvements since his appointment as CEO in October 2024. We’ll examine how the...
